imdb.title: Shinmai Maou no Testament
imdb.plot: First-year high school student, Toujo Basara, was suddenly have two beautiful step-sisters adopted by his father. But Mio and Maria's true forms are actually the newbie Demon Lord and a succubus!?

episodes.title: What I can do for you
episodes.plot: After the battle against Zolgia, Basara returns to a peaceful life with his sisters, Mio and Maria. One day, as he prepares for the school sports festival, Basara is attacked by a person being manipulated by magic.

episodes.title: Suspicions Deepening Within Mysteries
episodes.plot: The day of the sports festival is finally here! Basara remains cautious of the enemy who manipulates people with magic, but still enjoys the sports festival with Mio and Yuki as the three of them compete in the four-legged-race.

episodes.title: My Cherished Feelings for You
episodes.plot: After taking Kurumi hostage, Ornis robs Basara of the right arm wielding Bynhildr. Basara loses conciousness from the pain, but his sealed power is unleashed and goes on a rampage!

episodes.title: Amidst Entwining Plots
episodes.plot: As the clash between the peaceful faction and the present demon lord draws near, Basara visits the peaceful faction with Mio. Basara enjoys the reunion until learning that a heavy punishment awaits Maria for her betrayal: a spanking while she is aroused?!

episodes.title: Amidst the Wind Blowing Through the Battlefield
episodes.plot: Ramsus seeks to extract the "Demon Lord's Power" from Mio without concern for her safety, which angers Basara. Just as sparks are about to fly, Shella leads Basara into the bath to try and help calm him down.

episodes.title: Between Reality and One's Own Truth
episodes.plot: Basara and the others are called to Leohart's castle where Basara's father appears before them. He shares with them a message from Leohart: that they would hold a tournament before Leohart and Ramsus' forces to determine authority of the demon realm!

episodes.title: Between Entwining Plots and Desires
episodes.plot: Basara and the others finally face the current demon lord, Leohart. Leohart's confidence in his strength fills the air as he welcomes them in without any tricks. Can breasts overcome brawn?

episodes.title: Those Contending For The Future
episodes.plot: The group battle between Leohart and Ramsus's forces finally begins. After Mio wins the first match, Maria tries to face Lars in close combat. Will she have enough power to win the battle?

episodes.title: Beyond the Endless Dream
episodes.plot: The final match of the tournament begins! Basara faces Leohart, and the two demon swords clash in fierce battle. Will Basara's secret strategy tilt the fight in his favor?

episodes.title: The Consequences of What Must Be Done
episodes.plot: The council's rampage sends quakes through the demon realm! The demon Chaos is called forth, seeking to claim Basara, Mio, and Leohart's lives. Do they even stand a chance of victory with this supreme being before them?!

episodes.title: Tojo Basara's Perfectly Peaceful Daily Life
episodes.plot: What's the best way to celebrate a birthday? Well, to the succubus Maria, there's only one thing to do-get Mio and Basara to hook up! Using the guise of Mio's birthday, and a lust spell, she's determined to have the perfect setup for a sexy celebration.

episodes.title: Imouto ga dekita hi
episodes.plot: After Toujou Basara's father remarries, Toujou gains two step-sisters named Maria and Mio.

episodes.title: Hajimete no shujuu keiyaku
episodes.plot: In a strange twist of fate during a Master/Servant ceremony, Mio becomes Basara's servant which takes a sexual act to seal. During the first day of school with Mio, Basara runs into an old childhood friend.

episodes.title: Saikai no shinrai no hazama
episodes.plot: Things heat up at school when demons sense Mio's presence, followed by Yuki threatening her. Mio learns more about Basara's past.

episodes.title: Kanashimi ga zero ni naru made
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Asa no imouto no maou mosou
episodes.plot: Basara's morning starts with Maria in his bed, followed by Mio and Yuki in the bathroom. The hero clan upgrades Mio's status to kill.

episodes.title: Tsunoru Omoi o Kakaete
episodes.plot: Basara and his sisters prepare for their fight with the hero clan.

episodes.title: Onshu No Hate Ni
episodes.plot: The hero clan and the demon clan battle with some surprising twists.

episodes.title: Bousou no erosakyubasu
episodes.plot: Yuki wants a master/server pact with Basara, like he has with Mio, which only grows stronger when Basara and Mio have an encounter in the girls change room.

episodes.title: Shujuu no kouzai
episodes.plot: Basara and Yuki begin the ceremony to form their pact. Clad in a bustier and garter belt, Yuki was raring to go for it. But when she refused to forge the pact normally she fell victim to the same succubus curse as Mio!

episodes.title: Aisetsunaru haishin
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Chouhou-sha... Sono sakini aru mono
episodes.plot: Basara and then his sisters take on Zolgia, when he is injured the true form of the building they are in reveals itself to be a creature, resulting in them being trapped inside it's belly.

episodes.title: Kono yoru, kono toki no tame ni
episodes.plot: The final battle takes place within the belly of the beast as Lars and Zolgia look on from a distance.

episodes.title: Tojo Basara no hadosuwitona nichijo
episodes.plot: Another morning at the Toujou household: Maria sets up a special succubus camera that can capture the target's dream, in this case Mio's. After putting an end to Maria's blatant breach of privacy, Basara then tests Maria's latest cooking experiment which turns out to be strangely perverted. Yuki is not phased by any of this, and when Mio finally wakes up the innocent Basara falls victim to her outburst. The school nurse, Hasegawa Chisato, is wearing a new swimsuit and the zipper is stuck. She asks Basara to help her unzip it.
